summary: In the grips of delirious illusion, Anna, a young, gentle and shy young woman convinces herself that Doctor Zanevsky is fervently in love with her. Nothing can shake her certainty... But ... See full summary »
cast: Isabelle Carré|Gaëlle Bona|Geneviève Mnich|Gilbert Melki|Delphine Zingg|Anne Consigny|Caroline Maillet|Pascal Bongard|Samir Guesmi|Catherine Epars|Juliette Batlle|Francis Renaud|Laurence Marques|Abel Malek|Eric Savin|Fenella Woodgate|Raphaelle Doyle|Daniel San Pedro|François Loriquet|Valérie Kéruzoré|Geordy Monfils|Julie Brochen|Olivier Leroux
title: Anna M.
